text.text_translated: Robotics is the science of building and using robots. AI is when a computer can learn and think like a person. Julie Wong is one of the best researchers. She works with Robotics and AI. She wrote more than 50 papers. These papers are in very good science magazines. Other top scientists check her work before it is shared. She often speaks at big meetings in different countries. In 2012, she got a special prize. Only the best scientists receive this prize. The prize's name is the Simone Fielding fellowship. Julie lives with her family in a smart home. A smart home is a house where computers control things. She made the plan for the house herself.

feedback.feedback: PASS: This feedback is excellent. It is direct, specific, and actionable. It correctly identifies the 'Factual Inaccuracy' by citing the omission of 'Royal Academy' and the 'Meaning Preservation Failure' by contrasting 'prestigious' with 'special prize'. The 'Corrective Path' provides clear, concrete instructions for fixing the errors.
